function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases during in-person interviews and meetings","Impact":"Risk of infection and potential transmission of diseases to interviewees and researchers","Mitigation":"Replace in-person interviews with virtual meetings and video calls","Technologies":"Video conferencing platforms, virtual meeting software","People":"Interviewees, researchers, ecosystem actors","Owner":"Research team, interviewers, research institution"},{"Description":"Lack of funding for future research on the impact of contagious diseases","Impact":"Inability to prepare for future comparable events and understand the effects of policy measures during crises","Mitigation":"Seek external funding, collaborate with research institutions, apply for grants","Technologies":"Grant application platforms, collaborative research tools","People":"Researchers, research institution, funding agencies","Owner":"Research team, research institution"},{"Description":"Inadequate preparation for future economic crises related to contagious diseases","Impact":"Lack of understanding the effect of short response times to economic crises, leading to unpreparedness for future events","Mitigation":"Conduct research on the effect of short response times, analyze the impact of policy measures, develop crisis response strategies","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, crisis simulation software","People":"Researchers, policymakers, government agencies","Owner":"Research team, policymakers"}]}
